text: Anto Đogić (born 18 April 1952) is a retired Yugoslav professional basketball player. ==Playing career== ===Club career=== During his professional career, Đogić played most notably for Bosna.KK Bosna, uspon i pad evropskog šampiona ===National team career=== Đogić won a gold medal with the Yugoslav national team at the 1977 EuroBasket in Belgium where he was coached by Aleksandar Nikolić. ==Notes== ==References== ==External links== * FIBA profile Category:Living people Category:1952 births Category:Sportspeople from Sarajevo Category:Croats of Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Yugoslav men's basketball players Category:FIBA EuroBasket-winning players Category:KK Bosna Royal players Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina men's basketball players
title: Anto Đogić
